entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arctic Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:18 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arctic Bay Airport 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -38.5°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -43.0°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
